meanings.definition: A device used for removing boots.
meanings.sent1: My grandpa has a wooden bootjack by the door.
meanings.sent2: I used the bootjack to pull off my muddy boots.
meanings.sent3: The bootjack looked like a tiny wooden seesaw.
meanings.sent4: The bootjack was a lifesaver after a long day of hiking.
meanings.sent5: The bootjack's simple design makes boot removal effortless.

meanings.definition: To remove boots using a bootjack.
meanings.sent1: She carefully bootjacked her rain boots off.
meanings.sent2: He always bootjacks his work boots before entering the house.
meanings.sent3: Bootjacking felt like a fun game of tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: I had to bootjack with all my strength to get the stuck boot off.
meanings.sent5: Bootjacking quickly became a part of my daily routine.
